# ASCII Compliance Issues Test Fixture

This fixture tests ASCII compliance detection.

## Valid ASCII Content

This section contains only ASCII characters: Hello World! 123

## Non-ASCII Characters

This section contains non-ASCII characters that should be detected:
- café (French)
- résumé (French)
- naïve (French)
- 日本語 (Japanese)
- café résumé naïve 日本語

## Mixed Content

This section has both ASCII and non-ASCII: Hello café world! 123
